``` ::: ::: # 取出某一行 ## 方法1 ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ``` {.julia .cell-code} df.V # df."V" ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ``` 203-element Vector{Float64}: 0.08 0.45 0.17 0.25 0.97 0.85369167324573 0.06 0.590868123957716 0.36 0.06 0.51 0.310592788968676 0.53 ⋮ 0.11 0.08 0.47 0.15 0.11 0.82 0.07 0.36 0.12 0.2 0.3 0.288668959788242 ``` ::: ::: ## 方法2 ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ``` {.julia .cell-code} df[:, :V] # 这种情况下取值更改不会改变之前的数据框内容 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ``` 203-element Vector{Float64}: 0.08 0.45 0.17 0.25 0.97 0.85369167324573 0.06 0.590868123957716 0.36 0.06 0.51 0.310592788968676 0.53 ⋮ 0.11 0.08 0.47 0.15 0.11 0.82 0.07 0.36 0.12 0.2 0.3 0.288668959788242 ``` ::: ::: # 列名 ::: {.cell execution_count=5} ``` {.julia .cell-code} names(df, AbstractString) # 筛选出不同数据类型的列名 names(df, Float64) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6} ``` 6-element Vector{String}: "lon" "lat" "Eh" "V" "Ni" "Ba" ``` ::: ::: # 创建一个0行但包含全部列名的df ::: {.cell execution_count=6} ``` {.julia .cell-code} empty(df) # empty!()直接让目标df清空 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7} ```{=html}
